notesStmt.note: Compilership erroneously attributed to Richard Day and to John Day.
One of two compilations sometimes called "Queen Elizabeth's prayer book".
The first section is largely selected, with minor modifications, from "Christian prayers and holy meditations" compiled by Henry Bull.
Signatures (per F.S. Ferguson notes): a-p⁴; A-M⁴ N² 2A-2P⁴ 2Q² . Quires A-F are paginated 41-88; 2A-2F paginated 1-48.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
